column4: how do you fix the problem where you cannot retrieve packages using the update manager?
I have been trying to update for a couple days but keep getting the same error
I was using the graphical end fabjoa_mwoz
that is one of the error messages Dr_Willis
trying to find out why apt-get can't get the packages from the server
have you read the errors why  > it will tell you
the error is just that it failed to fetch... Not Found
go into sys > adm > software sources and check all
it is all checked except for source code
did you check all folders > updates > and other software?
see relax take a Valium  < smoke a doob
